original_text: I will send famine and wild beasts against you, and they will leave you childless. Plague and bloodshed will sweep through you, and I will bring the sword against you. I the Lord have spoken.”
korean_text: 내가 기근과 사나운 짐승을 너희에게 보내 외롭게 하고 너희 가운데에 전염병과 살륙이 일어나게 하고 또 칼이 너희에게 임하게 하리라 나 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: I will send famine and wild beasts against you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 치려고 기근과 들짐승을 보내리라

sentences.original_text: and they will leave you childless
Plague and bloodshed will sweep through you
and I will bring the sword against you
